product_name: Patagonia Synchilla Snap-T Fleece Jacket - Boys' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The boys' Patagonia Synchilla Snap-T fleece jacket is a quality jacket made from hearty double-faced fleece that looks good wash after wash. The full-length zipper has an internal windflap and the neck is double lined with fleece to keep out the cold. Includes zippered handwarmer pockets and a snap chest pocket sized just right for treasures. Polyester fleece is 86% recycled and 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-. Closeout.
short_description: The boys' Patagonia Synchilla Snap-T fleece jacket is a quality jacket made from hearty double-faced fleece that looks good wash after wash.
